name: A Little to the Left: Drawers

editorialNotes.short: Unravel family secrets on a remote island cursed by plagues in this dark puzzle adventure.

editorialNotes.tagline: Team up to solve the puzzles

name: A Little to the Left: Stars

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: The enchantingly eccentric Rusty Lake series heads underground! Solve strange puzzles in train stations representing different eras of a womans life.

ios.subtitle: The moving story of a lifetime

editorialNotes.standard: Movings a drag!Relocate tothis satisfying puzzler in which you unpack boxes filled with all sorts of goodies.

Mesmerising from start to finish, Monument Valley offers a world of uncanny beauty and constant wonder. To help a princess proceed on her mysterious quest, youll face ingenious puzzles that involve lifting and spinning the environment in seemingly impossible ways. Its a mind-bending journey filled with the joy of discovery, making Ustwos adventure a must-play for gamers of every experience level.
editorialNotes.short: Traverse mind-bending levels that are structurally impossible
Brilliant puzzle designs and a haunting atmosphere make this unforgettable
editorialNotes.standard: Now heres how you build a sequel! With The Room Three, Fireproof Games kept everything we love about this seriesits chilling atmosphere, mind-bending puzzles and beautiful visualswhile making masterful enhancements. The story continues with trials set by a creepy new nemesis, The Craftsman. As you explore huge areas and tiny ones, the challenges feel increasingly epic, and a better-than-ever hint system ensures that finding solutions is super-rewarding.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: When dinosaurs collide with LEGO bricks, you dont have to be Mr. DNA to know the result is pure fun. Starring characters and creatures from all four Jurassic Park movies, this fantastic adventure lets you relive your favorite moments from the series and even create new ones with your own custom dinos. Full of all the humor, action, and surprises you expect, its a wacky team-up of T-Rex proportions.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Put a little boo in your botany by concocting herbal remedies for odd supernatural ailments in this eerie puzzle-adventure.
Enigmatic settings and storytelling enrich the mysteries of Leonardo da Vincis gadgetry in this escape room puzzle series fantastic conclusion.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: With relaxed swapping rules and charming graphics, this surprisingly slick match-3 puzzler makes the genre feel fresh again.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.short: Beautiful, challenging, and always inventive - these brilliant puzzles will really test you.

editorialNotes.standard: A fascinating reinvention of a longtime videogame franchise, Hitman GO takes familiar elements of stealth and assassination and reinterprets them as a wondrously stylised, turn-based boardgame. Each mission presents characters and scenessome from previous Hitman gamesas a sleek diorama, blending old and new to create an innovative experience. Even with helpful distractions and places to hide, inching toward your targets a step at a time demands keen strategy, and trying to pull off optional mission objectives quickly becomes an irresistible obsession.

ios.subtitle: A game about life, loss & hope

editorialNotes.standard: An Apple Design Award winner, this moving puzzler proves sometimes the best stories dont need words. Developer Broken Rules has created a hand-drawn world that bubbles with whimsy and heart. Altering the landscape to reveal hidden paths makes for fascinating, peaceful gameplay. We love exploring the storybook settings and uncovering each touching memory. Its unforgettable, and wed move mountains just to relive the experience.
editorialNotes.short: Experience the meditative voyage of a gentleman puzzling through his past.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Imagine WALLE directed by Tim Burtonthats the weird, wonderful world of Machinarium. But this cute robots quest for love combines tons more influenceslike point-and-click adventures, hidden-object puzzlers, and comic booksfor a truly unique experience. Challenging but full of awesome aha! moments, its an artistic odyssey that looks amazing on iPhone, iPad, or Apple TV.

editorialNotes.short: Explore a vivid world filled with remarkable style and attention to detail.

name: Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons

editorialNotes.tagline: Two heads are better than one

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: After a long day at work, its bath time! But Swampys shower is broken and he needs your help to guide the water to him. Navigate a path through the dirt past contraptions and obstacles to get every drop to fill the bath.
Search for a missing dog through lavishly illustrated cityscapes in this relaxing adventure game.

ios.subtitle: A story of beauty and illusion

editorialNotes.standard: We couldnt wait to go back to the land of twisty towers and uncanny beautyand this sequel didnt let us down. With its striking colours and level design, its even more stunning than the first game. New elements like light beams and controlling two characters make the puzzles even trickier. The bond between that mother and child is what well remember most, thoughtheir relationship moved us in a way few games do.
editorialNotes.short: An unforgettable adventure full of challenging puzzles and gorgeous visuals.

name: Smart Baby Shapes: Learning games for toddler kids

editorialNotes.standard: If you can doodle, you can play this one-of-a-kind Apple Design Award winner. Just draw a lineany lineand watch it spring to life across the screen, following your gestures to collect coloured dots and avoid black holes. But as the holes form increasingly elaborate obstacles, only the most ingenious doodles will do. With endless solutions to every challenge, its a stylish, supremely satisfying test of your creativity and puzzle-solving prowess.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: A suspenseful story with thrilling puzzles
editorialNotes.standard: The concept alone bowls us over. Youre rearranging panels in an interactive comic bookchanging the outcome on each page until your sneaky spy avoids danger. But Frameds puzzle play isnt the only thing that thrilled us. We got so caught up in the suspenseful story and moody visuals, all we could think about at the end was giving it another go.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: Jump in and save the ninjas!

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Our beloved Om Nom is on another quest for candy, and not even the supernatural will get in the way of his sweet tooth. Featuring a totally revamped (and gorgeous) visual style and tons of new gameplay elements, Cut the Rope: Magic totally transforms the seriesas well as our hungry hero. For the first time ever, Om Nom can morph into all sorts of creaturesfrom a bird to a baby to a mouseto solve each enchanting puzzle.

Limbo is a gripping blend of stark, haunting landscapes, bizarre characters and unsettling sounds. With clever puzzle design, an intriguing narrative and an excellent touch-screen control system, its as rewarding to play as it is interesting to look at and listen to.
editorialNotes.short: Dark, haunting, beautiful. This'll stay with you long after it's over.
